edu.rit.io

Class FileResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.io.FileResource

  • public class FileResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Class FileResource encapsulates a file stored as a resource in the Java class path.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileResource(java.lang.String name)
      Construct a new file resource.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.io.File file()
      Get the file for reading the file resource.
      java.lang.String filename()
      Get the file name for reading the file resource.
      java.io.InputStream inputStream()
      Get an input stream for reading the file resource.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileResource

        public FileResource(java.lang.String name)
        Construct a new file resource.
        Parameters:
        name - Resource name relative to the Java class path.
